item.title: U2 - With Or Without You - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play With Or Without You by U2 on the ukulele. The chords used are C F G Am. (Original key is D. Here is a link to that video https://youtu.be/zk3PuRyhEmc)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: U2 - With Or Without You - Key of D
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play With Or Without You by U2 on the ukulele. The chords used are D G A Bm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
